question: The first Chief minister of Andhra Pradesh that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> Nov 1956:
explanation:
Neelam Sanjiva Reddy was the first Chief minister of Andhra Pradesh that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> Nov 1956.
T. Prakasam was the first Chief minister of Andhra state that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> oct 1953
Bezawada Gopal Reddy was the last Chief minister of Andhra state that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> oct 1953.
